question:
Read the following text to answer questions number 15 to 17. Last month, I sent to Surabaya with my friends for vacation. We went there on a night bus. When we arrived in Lamongan, the bus stopped at a small restaurant for a rest. I got off the bus to get a cup of ginger tea, and my friend drank some cold lemonade. Then I went to the toilet. It tool only a few minutes. When I came out again, the bus was not there, it had gone! My friends were not there too. Feeling shocked and confused. I asked a waiter About the bus. She said the bus departed about five minutes ago. I tried to call my friend on my phone, but the battery as running low. I could not do anything but hope and pray. After several minutes, my wish came true. The bus came back! I got on the bus and walked to my seat. I was so ashamed when everybody on the bus looked at me. I could feel my face turn red. 15. What is the best title of the text above? *     A. My vacation.
B. Vacation with my family.
C. Vacation to Surabaya.
D. Vacation to foreign Country.
Last month I went to Surabaya with my friends for vacation..." This part belongs to . . . . *
A. Orientation
B. Series of events
C. Reorientation
D. Setting of time and place
The bus was not there it had gone!" The word "it" in the second paragraph refers to . . . *
A. The writer
B. The bus
C. The waiter
The cold lemonade
​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

1. A. my vacation

2. D. Setting of time and place

3. B. The bus

Penjelasan:

semoga membantu :)

related_questions.question: Fill i the blanks with the form of positive degree

Nomor    5. The occupation of mr.Jake is.....
a. farme b. gardener c. butcher d. vendor

6. Mr.Jake usually.....the eggs ini the market. 
a. sells b. cleans c. uses d. consumes 

7.What does Mr.Jake use to clean the cagek?
a. A broom. b. A rake. c. A house. d. A pump. 


8 .From the text, we know that Mr. Jake..... 
a. buys chicken and cows 
b. asks soemeone cleand the cagek 
c. rarely cleans the cages
d. feeds his cattle every day


tolong kk di Jawa mks. 

​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

5. A. Farmer ( petani )

6. A. sells ( menjual )

7. A. broom ( sapu )

8. D. Feeds his cattle ( memberi makan ternaknya )

Penjelasan:

5. karena di teks terulis dia mempunyai pertanian kecil

6. karena di teks tertulis he sells th egg and milk

7. karena di teks tertulis Mr.Jake uses broom

8. karena di teks tertulis After feeding cattle

jadikan jawaban terhebat ya

Edit: di soal ada tulisan jawa

gw gk bisa bahasa jawa, jadi bahasa indo aja

Jawaban:

5. a farmer

6. a sells

7. b a rake

8. d feeds his cattle everyday

Penjelasan:

Indonesia translation :

Bapak Jake mempunyai peternakan kecil. Dia mempunyai banyak ayam dan sepuluh sapi. Bapak Jake memelihara ayam karena dia bisa menjual telurnya. Bapak juga memelihara sapi karena dapat menghasilkan susu. Dia menjual susu dan telur di pasar. Setiap hari Bapak Jake memberinya makan. Bapak Jake menggunakan sapu untuk membersihkan lantai. kemudian menggunakan penggaruk untuk mengumpulkan rumput. Bapak Jake juga membersihkan kandang dengan air. Dia menggunakan selang yang panjang dan mengalirkan air dari keran. kadang-kadang aku membantunya.

5. Apa pekerjaan Bapak Jake?

6. Bapak Jake biasanya .... telur di pasar.

7. Apa yang bapak Jake gunakan untuk membersihkan kandang?

8. Berdasarkan teks, kita tahu bahwa bapak Jake.

hope you find this helpful^•^
